basic.description: This course covers the physical properties of viscous fluids, hydrostatics, kinematics of flow fields, governing equations. Dynamics of viscous incompressible fluids: vorticity, boundary layer flow, potential flow.
basic.subject: MAP
basic.title: Introduction to Fluid Dynamics

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites: MAP 4153 and PHY 2048C. Corequisites: MAP 4341, MAP 5345, or instructor permission.
